response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. Given its exceptional quality and benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $120 to you. Considering this, I propose to sell it to you for $110. This is a special offer tailored to appreciate your interest and ensure you receive a great deal. Please let me know if this proposal suits your budget.", "product_price": 110}
